text: @AFP There are no clear evidence of the origin of COVID-19. Your stupid governments can not control the coronavirus like the Asian countries, because you all are told to not wear facial masks. The consequence is coming, don’t blame anyone yet, blame ur stupid arrogance and ur gov.
